Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in quality and excellence. Considering its unique features and the benefits it provides, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $14500. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider it carefully. Should you have any questions or require more information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
